hero.title: DJ + Sax that packs your dance floor in two tracks
hero.subtitle: Live mashups, a saxophonist on the dance floor, and realtime playlists tuned to your crowd.
hero.supportingCopy: 120+ events each year, a 4.9/5 rating across 180+ reviews, and a dedicated event manager preparing your intake.

testimonial.quote: Within ten minutes our wedding dance floor was full and they kept the energy going all night.
testimonial.author: Lisa & Robert ‚Äì Wedding Utrecht

items.quote: The DJ and saxophonist duo was the highlight of our wedding. The atmosphere was unforgettable!
items.author: John & Mary

items.quote: Professional, energetic, and they knew exactly how to keep the crowd engaged. Perfect for any corporate event.
items.author: Susan van Dijk

items.quote: The music was perfectly tailored to our guests. The saxophonist took it to the next level!
items.author: Mark de Vries

hero.title: Transparent DJ Packages
hero.subtitle: Choose the package that perfectly fits your event. From intimate parties to large weddings - we have the right offer for every occasion. Including professional sound, atmospheric lighting and optional live saxophone.

allIn.title: All-inclusive packages
allIn.description: No hidden costs. All prices include arrival, setup, performance and breakdown.

liveSax.title: Live Saxophone option
liveSax.description: Upgrade any package with a live saxophonist. The difference between fun and legendary.

guarantee.title: 100% Dance Guarantee
guarantee.description: Full dance floor or your money back. We've kept this promise in 500+ events.

brons.name: Bronze Package
brons.subtitle: Perfect for intimate parties
brons.description: Ideal for small parties and events up to 100 guests

zilver.name: Silver Package
zilver.subtitle: Favorite of 300+ couples
zilver.description: Most chosen for weddings and medium-sized events

goud.name: Gold Package
goud.subtitle: Premium All-Inclusive - Stress-free party
goud.description: Premium package for large events and weddings
